oai_dc:dc.dc:title: FIELD MEASUREMENTS OF UNDERTOW ON LONGSHORE BARS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kuriyama, Yoshiaki
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: longshore bar
undertow
field measurements
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Field measurements of undertow over longshore bars were conducted at Hazaki Oceanographical Research Station (HORS) on the Kashima coast of Japan facing the Pacific Ocean. The field measurements, other field measurements and large-scale experiments were compared with one-dimensional models for undertow; one of them was developed in this study. The comparisons showed that the present model well predicted the undertow velocities over longshore bars in the field, while a previous model calibrated with small-scale experiment data underestimated the velocities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
